mapper.select: SELECT c.*, t.trainername, g.gymName FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN class c on p.gymNo = c.gymNo and p.sportsclasstype = c.sportsclasstype LEFT JOIN gym g on c.gymNo = g.gymNo and g.gymMasterCk ='1' LEFT JOIN trainer t on c.trainerNo = t.trainerNo WHERE p.custNo=#{custNo} and p.ticketEx='0' and c.classNo is not null ORDER BY c.classstarttime

SELECT c.*, t.trainername, g.gymName FROM purchase p LEFT JOIN class c on p.gymNo = c.gymNo and p.sportsclasstype = c.sportsclasstype LEFT JOIN gym g on c.gymNo = g.gymNo and g.gymMasterCk ='1' LEFT JOIN trainer t on c.trainerNo = t.trainerNo WHERE p.custNo=#{custNo} and c.classDate=TO_DATE(#{classDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and p.ticketEx='0' and c.classFullbooked = '0' and c.classNo is not null ORDER BY c.classstarttime
